title: Georgia Power says it needs a huge increase in power capacity to meet data center demand
description: Georgia Power Co. seeks approval from Georgia's Public Service Commission to invest over $15 billion to increase electricity capacity by 50% for data centers, with a vote scheduled for December 19.
content: Georgia Power Co. seeks approval from Georgia's Public Service Commission to invest over $15 billion to increase electricity capacity by 50% for data centers, with a vote scheduled for December 19.
